biotools.summary:
EpiMethylTag simultaneously detects ATAC-seq or ChIP-seq signals with DNA methylation.
Activation of regulatory elements is thought to be inversely correlated with DNA methylation levels

EpiMethylTag simultaneously detects ATAC-seq or ChIP-seq signals with DNA methylation.
